page.title: 16EMERGENCY & OTHER SERVICES.
page.content: OTHER SERVICES. The relatively new {Police Station}is situated near the Clock Tower. The brand new{Fire {Station}has been built on the site of the old building that was once St. Nicholas' School, in School Lane. {Ambulance Services}are located in nearby Warwick and Leamington Spa. To {call up such services one has to dial {a special number on the telephone {which is 999.}The town has a very fine {Library}which stands next to the {Police Station}and which offers all kinds of{information services,}mounts exhibitions and organises special events for schools and other organisations. The{Waverley Day Centre in Waverley Road is a converted house which is specially staffed to{provide {facilities and care}for the{elderly}in the town.{Groups other}than these do{use}the{Centre occasionally.
